001package org.consensusj.daemon.micronaut;
002
003import io.micronaut.context.annotation.ConfigurationProperties;
004import io.micronaut.core.annotation.Nullable;
005import io.micronaut.core.bind.annotation.Bindable;
006import org.bitcoinj.base.BitcoinNetwork;
007import org.bitcoinj.base.Network;
008
009import java.nio.file.Path;
010
011/**
012 * Configuration record for the daemon. Typically read from a TOML file.
013 * @param networkId  name (see {@link BitcoinNetwork#toString()} or ID string of network (see {@link BitcoinNetwork#id()}
014 * @param serverPort Port Daemon will listen on
015 * @param dataDir Path to data directory
016 * @param walletBaseName Basename of wallet files (basename-net.wallet and basename-net.spvchain)
017 */
018@ConfigurationProperties("cjbitcoind.config")
019public record BitcoinDaemonConfig(String networkId, int serverPort, @Nullable Path dataDir,
020                                  @Bindable(defaultValue = "CJBitcoinDaemon") String walletBaseName)
021{
022    /**
023     * @return Defaults to {@link BitcoinNetwork#MAINNET}
024     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@link #networkId} isn't a valid name or id string.
025     */
026    public Network network() {
027        return networkId == null || networkId.isBlank()
028                ? BitcoinNetwork.MAINNET
029                : BitcoinNetwork.fromString(networkId).orElseGet(
030                            () -> BitcoinNetwork.fromIdString(networkId)
031                                .orElseThrow(() -> new IllegalArgumentException("Invalid network: " + networkId))
032                        );
033    }
034}
